QuestData.Title: Extrinsic Motivation
QuestData.Description: The Shattered Hand aren't strangers to pain. They each cut off their own hand as a sign of their allegiance to Kargath.$B$BIf you're going to get them to talk, it might take more than my poison.$B$BSlaughter them all. We'll see how far they're willing to go for their beloved warlord.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill $1oa Shattered Sightless, $2oa Shattered Harvesters, and $3oa Shattered Blood-Singer.
